channel.title: Comments on: Mas migration
channel.description: Won't you join me for a crazy crazy China adventure?

item.title: by: Pukie
item.description:
Will,I like to read your articles even though sometimes a lot of new words I feel very hard to make sense.
But it is really a very good feeling when I read it.
Thank you and have a wonderful trip.
Take care!~
Pukie
item.content:encoded:
Will,I like to read your articles even though sometimes a lot of new words I feel very hard to make sense.

But it is really a very good feeling when I read it.

Thank you and have a wonderful trip.

Take care!~

Pukie

item.title: by: marcus
item.description: Apperently Will Sanders wants us loyal blog readers to get a kink in the neck. Check out the photo page and see what I mean.
item.content:encoded: Apperently Will Sanders wants us loyal blog readers to get a kink in the neck. Check out the photo page and see what I mean.

item.title: by: robert paraguassu
item.description: i'd kind of like to wear a turban
item.content:encoded: i’d kind of like to wear a turban

item.title: by: Amy Bugg
item.description:
Will, it takes a very talented writer to make my smile turn an instant 180. Crazy.
(but brilliant, as always....I miss you tons).
item.content:encoded:
Will, it takes a very talented writer to make my smile turn an instant 180. Crazy.

(but brilliant, as always….I miss you tons).
